item.title: CBO 认为美国赤字 30 年来不断增加，经济增长放缓
item.description: 美国国会预算办公室周四预计，未来30年联邦预算赤字和债务将大幅增加，部分原因是利息成本迅速上升，同时该办公室还描绘了经济增长疲软和劳动力萎缩的前景。【原文：The U.S. Congressional Budget Office on Thursday projected significant increases in federal budget deficits and debt over the next 30 years, in part due to rapidly rising interest costs, as it sketched out sluggish economic growth and a shrinking workforce.】

item.title: 特朗普征收汽车关税使美联储审议利率问题复杂化
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统对进口汽车征收 25% 的永久性关税，扩大了全球贸易战的规模，助长了人们对汽车和其他产品价格上涨的预期，但对解决关于其执政两个月来的政策将如何影响美国经济的争论却作用甚微。【原文：President Donald Trump's permanent 25% tariff on imported autos has expanded the global trade war, feeding expectations for higher prices for cars and other products, but doing little to settle the debate about how policies of his two-month-old administration will affect the U.S. economy.】

item.title: 刺客信条》作者育碧在腾讯支持下成立 40 亿欧元子公司
item.description: 法国电子游戏制造商育碧公司（Ubisoft）周四表示，该公司已成立了一家子公司，中国腾讯将向其投资 11.6 亿欧元（12.5 亿美元）。【原文：French videogame maker Ubisoft said on Thursday it has set up a subsidiary in which China's Tencent will invest 1.16 billion euros ($1.25 billion).】

item.title: 可口可乐将在阿根廷投资超过 14 亿美元
item.description: 可口可乐阿根廷公司周四在一份声明中表示，该公司和装瓶商将在南美国家投资超过 14 亿美元，以提高产量、改善物流和优化基础设施。【原文：Coca-Cola Argentina and bottlers will invest more than $1.4 billion in the South American country to boost production, improve logistics, and optimize infrastructure, the company said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 诺和诺德股价有望创 2002 年以来最大单月跌幅，投资者担忧加剧
item.description: 诺和诺德股价 3 月份迄今已下跌 25%，并有望创下自 2002 年 7 月以来的最大单月跌幅，因为投资者更加担心这家肥胖症药物市场的先驱已失去了对美国礼来公司的优势。【原文：Novo Nordisk shares have fallen 25% so far in March and are on track for their biggest monthly drop since July 2002, as investor worries intensify that the obesity drug market pioneer has lost its edge over U.S. Eli Lilly .】

item.title: 沃尔格林支付超过 285 万美元解决美国多收费指控
item.description: 美国司法部周四表示，沃尔格林公司将支付超过 285 万美元，以了结举报人指控该药房向佐治亚州和马萨诸塞州的医疗补助计划多收非专利药品费用的指控。【原文：Walgreen will pay more than $2.85 million to settle whistleblower allegations that the pharmacy overbilled Medicaid programs in Georgia and Massachusetts for generic medications, the U.S. Department of Justice said on Thursday.】

item.title: 德国肖尔茨称特朗普的关税政策是错误的，所有人都将蒙受损失
item.description: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）周四表示，唐纳德-特朗普对汽车征收关税的决定是错误的，美国总统选择了一条只会产生输家的道路。【原文：German Chancellor Olaf Scholz said on Thursday Donald Trump's decision to impose tariffs on cars is wrong and the U.S. president had chosen a path that would produce only losers.】

item.title: 投资者质疑比特币支点，GameStop 股价暴跌
item.description: GameStop 的股价周四下跌超过 15%，因为该公司计划为其比特币业务提供融资，这引发了人们对其行动时机及其扭转零售业务困境的战略的质疑。【原文：Shares of GameStop fell more than 15% on Thursday after the company's plan to finance its bitcoin pivot raised questions about the timing of its move and its strategy to turn around its struggling retail business.】

item.title: 欧盟委员会主席维尔库宁表示，欧盟委员会计划推出新的半导体支持计划
item.description: 欧洲委员会数字主管亨娜-维尔库宁（Henna Virkkunen）周四表示，继本月行业团体和立法者呼吁制定 "芯片法案 2.0 "之后，欧洲正在寻求更多支持其半导体行业的方法。【原文：Europe is looking at additional ways to support its semiconductor industry, European Commission digital chief Henna Virkkunen said on Thursday, following calls this month from industry groups and lawmakers for a "Chips Act 2.0".】

item.title: 卡尼将向媒体介绍加拿大对关税的反应
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）的办公室在一份声明中表示，加拿大总理马克-卡尼将于东部时间周四下午1:30（格林尼治标准时间17:30）在内阁会议讨论加拿大对美国关税的回应之后对记者发表讲话。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney will speak to reporters at 1:30 p.m. Eastern Time (1730 GMT) on Thursday after a cabinet meeting to discuss Canada's response to U.S. tariffs, his office said in a statement.】

item.title: 汽车运输船在关税逼近前向美国发送更多货物
item.description: 航运数据显示，今年头几个月，从欧洲、中国、日本和韩国运往美国的汽车运输船比去年多，这表明企业在关税逼近之前提前装运货物。【原文：Car-carrying ships have sent more cargo from Europe and China, Japan and Korea to the United States in the first months of the year than last year, shipping data showed, in a sign of companies front-loading shipments ahead of looming tariffs.】

item.title: Stellantis 的埃尔坎对美国加征关税后的汽车价格表示担忧
item.description: Stellantis 公司董事长约翰-埃尔坎（John Elkann）周四对美国对汽车制造业征收 25% 的关税对汽车成本和需求的影响表示担忧。【原文：John Elkann, the chairman of Stellantis , voiced concerns on Thursday over the impact of 25% U.S. tariffs imposed on the carmaking sector on the cost of vehicles and demand.】

item.title: 独家报道贸易消息人士称美国暂停向世贸组织缴纳会费
item.description: 三位贸易消息人士告诉路透社，随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府加大削减政府开支的力度，美国已暂停向世界贸易组织缴纳会费。【原文：The United States has paused contributions to the World Trade Organization, three trade sources told Reuters, as U.S. President Donald Trump's administration ramps up efforts to cut government spending.】

item.title: 独家报道特朗普的关税威胁促使一些制药商加速向美国发货
item.description: 由于担心唐纳德-特朗普总统4月2日宣布的关税可能包括欧洲制造的产品，一些制药商正在采取不同寻常的措施，通过空运向美国运送更多药品，两位高管和两家物流公司如是说。【原文：Some drugmakers are taking the unusual step of sending more medicines by air to the U.S., two executives and two logistics firms said amid fears President Donald Trump's April 2 tariffs announcement could include products made in Europe.】

item.title: 菲利普-莫里斯公司的加热烟草设备 IQOS 在得克萨斯州开始销售
item.description: 菲利普-莫里斯国际公司周四在得克萨斯州奥斯汀正式推出了 IQOS，拉开了全球最大卷烟生产商在美国为其旗舰加热烟草设备建立市场的序幕。【原文：Philip Morris International officially launched IQOS in Austin, Texas, on Thursday, kicking off efforts by the world's largest cigarette maker to build a market for its flagship heated tobacco device in the United States.】

item.title: 欧洲汽车供应商机构呼吁解决问题，而非征收关税
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布对外国制造的汽车征收25%的关税后，欧洲汽车供应商协会（CLEPA）周四呼吁欧洲的政策制定者优先寻找解决方案，而不是贸易壁垒。【原文：The European association of automotive suppliers (CLEPA) on Thursday called on policymakers in Europe to prioritise finding solutions over trade barriers after U.S. President Donald Trump announced 25% tariffs on foreign-made vehicles.】

item.title: 面对美国汽车关税，墨西哥努力争取优惠待遇
item.description: 墨西哥经济部长周四表示，在华盛顿宣布对进口汽车征收关税后，墨西哥正在努力为其重要的汽车行业争取豁免。【原文：Mexico is working to carve out an exemption for its critical autos industry after Washington announced tariffs on imported vehicles, Mexico's economy minister said on Thursday.】

item.title: 汽车租赁公司赫兹和安飞士业绩大增，因为关税被认为损害了新车需求
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）计划对进口汽车征收25%的关税，消费者可能会选择租车而不是购买昂贵的新车，因此被高度做空的赫兹（Hertz）和安飞士（Avis Budget Group）股价周四大涨。【原文：Shares of highly shorted Hertz and Avis Budget Group surged on Thursday as U.S. President Donald Trump's plan to slap a 25% tariff on imported vehicles raised prospects of consumers opting for car rentals instead of buying expensive new cars.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织评估特朗普关税计划，但认为美国不会出现经济衰退
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）发言人朱莉-科扎克（Julie Kozack）周四表示，IMF正在继续评估唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统关税计划的影响，包括其新的25%的汽车关税，但IMF的基线预测并未设想美国会出现经济衰退。【原文：The International Monetary Fund is continuing to assess the impact of President Donald Trump's tariff plans, including his new 25% autos tariffs, but the IMF's baseline forecasts do not envision a U.S. recession, IMF spokesperson Julie Kozack said on Thursday.】

item.title: TikTok Shop 加强欧洲扩张，美国前景不明
item.description: 电子商务平台 TikTok Shop 表示将于周一向法国、德国和意大利的用户推出，从而进一步扩大其在欧洲的影响力，尽管如果中国所有者字节跳动（ByteDance）找不到美国买家，TikTok 在美国将面临被关闭的命运。【原文：E-commerce platform TikTok Shop said it will launch to users in France, Germany, and Italy on Monday, expanding its reach further into Europe even as TikTok faces being shut down in the U.S. if Chinese owner ByteDance does not find an American buyer.】

item.title: 在扭亏为盈的最新调整中，三名英特尔董事会成员将退休
item.description: 芯片制造商英特尔周四在一份监管文件中表示，在新任命的首席执行官陈立武的历史性交接之际，英特尔董事会的三名成员将不会在 2025 年的年度会议上竞选连任。【原文：Three Intel board members will not stand for reelection at its 2025 annual meeting, the chipmaker said in a regulatory filing on Thursday, amid a historic transition under newly appointed CEO Lip-Bu Tan.】

item.title: 在哥谭市指控其操纵指标后，Kyndryl 股价暴跌
item.description: 在做空机构 Gotham City 发布研究报告，指控这家 IT 服务提供商操纵某些财务指标后，Kyndryl 公司股价周四下跌超过 11%。【原文：Shares of Kyndryl fell more than 11% on Thursday, after a research report from short-seller Gotham City alleged the IT services provider has manipulated certain financial metrics.】

item.title: 特朗普汽车关税瞄准亚洲经济支柱--以及民族自豪感
item.description: 对日本和韩国来说，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布的关税措施是对国内汽车产业的打击，而这些产业既是经济支柱，也是民族自豪感的来源。【原文：For Japan and South Korea, tariffs announced by U.S. President Donald Trump represent a blow to domestic car industries that are both economic pillars and sources of national pride.】

item.title: 特朗普的汽车关税将打击许多公司，但对埃隆-马斯克的特斯拉打击较小
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的新汽车关税政策可能会对全球汽车业造成影响，但有一个公司受到的影响较小，那就是电动汽车制造商特斯拉（Tesla）。【原文：As the global auto world reeled from the potential fallout of Donald Trump's new auto tariffs, one name stood out as less affected than others - electric-vehicle maker Tesla .】

item.title: 美国 2 月成屋销售反弹
item.description: 由于抵押贷款利率下降，美国旧房购买合同在 2 月份略有反弹，但经济不确定性的上升可能会限制反弹势头。【原文：Contracts to buy U.S. previously owned homes rebounded marginally in February amid a decline in mortgage rates but rising economic uncertainty could limit momentum.】

item.title: 沃尔玛墨西哥分公司将在 2025 年投资 60 亿美元
item.description: 沃尔玛墨西哥分公司周四表示，今年将在该国投资 60 多亿美元，约为前一年计划支出的三倍。【原文：Walmart's Mexico unit said on Thursday it would invest more than $6 billion in the country this year, around triple its planned spending from the year before.】

item.title: Cleo AI 将支付 1700 万美元，以了结美国联邦贸易委员会对其欺骗消费者的指控
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会周四表示，Cleo AI 同意支付 1700 万美元，以了结该委员会对该现金垫款公司在客户可获得多少资金和资金到账速度方面欺骗客户的指控。【原文：Cleo AI agreed to pay $17 million to settle U.S. Federal Trade Commission charges that the cash advance company deceived customers about how much money they could obtain and how fast it would be, the regulator said on Thursday.】

item.title: 部长表示，意大利对特朗普可能征收的葡萄酒关税感到担忧，但并不 "害怕"。
item.description: 意大利农业部长周四表示，意大利对美国可能对葡萄酒征收的任何新关税感到担忧，但并不 "害怕"。【原文：Italy is concerned but not "terrified" of any new tariffs the United States could impose on wine, the country's agriculture minister said on Thursday, adding he hoped diplomatic efforts could avert damage to a key industry.】

item.title: 独家：首席执行官称，IAG 将考虑出售欧洲航空 20% 的股份
item.description: 随着西班牙欧罗巴航空公司（Air Europa）的所有者继续与法航-荷航（Air France-KLM）和汉莎航空（Lufthansa）就出售该公司股份进行谈判，英国航空公司（British Airways）的所有者国际航空集团（IAG）将考虑出售其持有的该公司 20% 的股份。【原文：British Airways-owner IAG will consider selling its 20% stake in Air Europa as the Spanish airline's owner continues talks with Air France-KLM and Lufthansa to sell a stake in the company.】

item.title: 法拉利称美国汽车关税不会影响 2025 年财务目标
item.description: 意大利豪华跑车制造商法拉利周四表示，尽管美国征收新的汽车关税，但法拉利今年的财务目标将保持不变。【原文：Italian luxury sports carmaker Ferrari said on Thursday its financial targets for this year will remain unchanged despite the new auto tariffs imposed by the United States.】
